original_title: Masters of Poker: Phil Hellmuth's Million Dollar Texas Hold'em Tournament Strategies
overview: The champion of numerous international tournaments, Phil Hellmuth has amassed more than $3 million in the World Series of Poker. On this third volume of the instructional video series, Hellmuth presents his proven strategies for winning the popular poker variation known as Texas Hold 'Em. He explains the rules and reveals the maneuvers that have made him one of the best players in the world.
title: Masters of Poker: Phil Hellmuth's Million Dollar Texas Hold'em Tournament Strategies
